mapper.insert: insert into member( id, pw, name, tel, address, birth, cdate ) values( #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{birth}, systimestamp)
mapper.update: update member set tel= #{tel}, pw= #{pw}, name=#{name}, address=#{address}, birth=#{birth}, udate=systimestamp where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, pw, tel, name, SUBSTR(address,0,INSTR(address, ',', 1, 1)-1) as address1, SUBSTR(address, INSTR(address, ',', 1, 1)+1, INSTR(address, ',', 1, 2)-7) as address2, SUBSTR(address, INSTR(address, ',', 1, 2)+1, INSTR(address, ',', 1, 2)) as address3, birth, cdate, udate, admin from member where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
